Description: They are exceptionally beautiful, with an exotic-yet-familiar facial structure and an arresting gaze. People are attracted to them before they even open their mouth

They are at Berserker Human, they have no honor in the hunt, unlick rival clans, as they will hunt unarmed prey with their clan. They are a relentless and ruthless hunger, and they have also shown to be sadistic, seemingly savoring the fear of the prey throughout the hunt. Despite their brutality, they are also an incredibly skilled fighter, proving this by repeatedly emerging victorious in battle against Humans, Xenomorth, and Predator alike. Unsurprisingly, their arrogance will be their demise. They are four times as likely to start a social fight as others.

Description: They are a wanderer; an outcast, half-breed mage class frequently dubbed a hedge-mage. Their carefree personality has kept them from developing class abilities. Instead, they have learned to improve on a vast number of utility abilities that allow them to adapt to any situation. Wanderers prefer the open road and gain a mood boost for being in a caravan. Caravans with a wanderer will ignore the movement penalties of any world tile. However, the wanderlust will cause them to suvver a mood penalty for remaining at a colony for too long
